messages.title: Our local champion for over 30 years
The Conservatives CAN'T WIN HERE
messages.content: Liberal Democrat Simon Hughes was MP here for 32 years. Labour won in 2015 by just a few thousand votes. A vote for the Conservatives in this constituency will only help Jeremy Corbyn.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting for affordable homes - fighting Labour’s luxury developments
Giving people not politicians the final say on the final Brexit deal

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour Uncut expect the election here to be neck and neck. Your support can stop Labour sneaking back in.
